snippet: The Staal brothers will face each other on Thursday for the first time since Marc sustained a concussion last year on a legal but uncharacteristically vicious check by Eric.
abstract: Carolina Hurricanes captain Eric Staal and his brother Marc, New York Rangers defenseman, will face each other for the first time since Eric's legal but uncharacteristically vicious check on Marc in Feb 2011 sidelined him with a concussion.
lead_paragraph: The Staal brothers will face each other on Thursday for the first time since Marc sustained a concussion last year on a legal but uncharacteristically vicious check by Eric.

headline.seo: Staal Brothers to Renew Hockey Rivalry
headline.main: Brothers to Renew Rivalry on the Ice
headline.print_headline: Brothers To Renew Rivalry On the Ice
